main event: Two objects with bright yellow and white lights were observed flying over Providence, Rhode Island on 12 August 1965.
interesting points: The objects were observed by employees of the US Signal Corps and local police officers,The lights appeared to be connected to a disc-shaped object,The sighting occurred at about 10:10 PM EST,The objects were seen through binoculars and hovered for several minutes before accelerating away,No physical evidence was reported.
sighted object: two flying objects with bright lights
witness description: employees of the US Signal Corps and local police officers
